FAQs

We are a licensed facility located in Europe and ship the products from countries with government regulated prices, so we are able to offer more affordable prices both for small and large businesses.

Our team purchases these products in bulk from respected pharmaceutical manufacturers as Allergan, Galderma, Ipsen, etc. through our Pharma license. We do not sell generic products and guarantee high quality.
